parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From ek and klino; to deviate, i.e. to shun, or to decline.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.
Bad, evil, in the widest sense. Apparently a primary word; worthless, i.e. depraved, or injurious.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To seek, search for, desire, require, demand. Of uncertain affinity; to seek; specially, to worship, or to plot.
Probably from a primary verb eiro; peace; by implication, prosperity.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To pursue, hence: I persecute. A prolonged form of a primary verb dio; to pursue; by implication, to persecute.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Feminine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
